definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
Chinese People's Armed Police Force (PAP, aka CAPF)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Wu3 zhuang1 Jing3 cha2 Bu4 dui4
containing_words.word: 中国人民武装警察部队

sentences.english: Nine Thai officers from the anti-narcotics unit have since been charged with murder.
sentences.chinese: 泰国缉毒部队的九名人员已被指控犯有谋杀罪。

sentences.english: One was the discovery by Allied troops of the German death camps.
sentences.chinese: 一个是发现由德国死亡集中营盟军部队。

sentences.english: Running our of grain, the army had to live on wild fruit and tree bark.
sentences.chinese: 部队断了粮，只能靠野果和树皮充饥。

sentences.english: The only non-ceasefire group active along the border is the Shan State Army "South"'s Force 701.
sentences.chinese: 沿边境活跃的唯一非停火武装是南掸邦军701部队。

sentences.english: That is because Malian government forces are fighting against rebels .
sentences.chinese: 这是因为马里政府部队正对抗叛军。

sentences.english: After he graduated, he joined the army and devoted himself to making his motherland safe.
sentences.chinese: 毕业之后他参加了部队，献身于保卫祖国。

sentences.english: The additional troops quickly divided the North Korean forces, which had been stretched from north to south.
sentences.chinese: 增援部队迅速分，被拉长了，从南到北朝鲜的力量。

sentences.english: But problems within that force have put additional burdens on MONUC.
sentences.chinese: 但是该部队内部的问题加重了MONUC的负担。

sentences.english: The Delingha brigade is often referred to as a training unit.
sentences.chinese: 德令哈旅经常被认为是一支训练部队。

sentences.english: Akinjis, meaning 'raiders', are light cavalry serving in Muslim forces.
sentences.chinese: 阿金基意为骑兵，是服役于穆斯林军中的轻骑兵部队。

sentences.english: China would likely respond by mobilizing the Shenyang Military Region forces and could send forces into North Korea to control refugee flow.
sentences.chinese: 中国可能出动沈阳军区的部队进入朝鲜以控制难民潮。

sentences.english: ShangMingYang father came to visit troops, both father and son a heart-to-heart talk.
sentences.chinese: 汤名扬的爸爸来到部队探望儿子，父子二人促膝谈心。

sentences.english: British unit of nonprofessional soldiers organized for defense of GB.
sentences.chinese: 英国为其防御而组织的非专业的部队单位。

sentences.english: Certainly the German spearheads were very close.
sentences.chinese: 德国的先头部队一定相距很近。

sentences.english: The order of commendation from the general headquarters lifted up still higher the morale of the troops.
sentences.chinese: 总司令部的嘉奖令大大地鼓舞了那个部队的士气。

sentences.english: We will continue to carry forward the fine tradition of troops.
sentences.chinese: 我们将继续发扬部队的优良传统。

definition: war zone/combat zone/(military) theater of operations
